thread.title: Kingsman 2 to shoot in April 2016 as Robin Hood: Origins is pushed back to accommodate star Taron Egerton
thread.title_full: Kingsman 2 to shoot in April 2016 as Robin Hood: Origins is pushed back to accommodate star Taron Egerton

title: Kingsman 2 to shoot in April 2016 as Robin Hood: Origins is pushed back to accommodate star Taron Egerton
text:
0 Movies News Kingsman 2 to shoot in April 2016 as Robin Hood: Origins is pushed back to accommodate star Taron Egerton Tuesday, Oct 13 2015, 16:15 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ Kingsman: The Secret Service director Matthew Vaughn has got his way: star Taron Egerton 's previously inconvenient project, Robin Hood: Origins , has made way for Kingsman 2 .Earlier in the month, there was some inter-studio discord after Vaughn used a clause in Egerton's contract to force him to shoot early next year, leaving Robin Hood: Origins in the lurch as it wanted to shoot in the springtime too. 
© 20th Century Fox 
Taron Egerton with co-star Michael Caine in Kingsman: The Secret Service (2015) Lionsgate, the merry men behind the project, have now agreed to delay the shoot, and there is peace across the land as 20th Century Fox nabs the April slot.Great news for Egerton as he gets to continue one successful franchise and later hopefully start another. 
© 20th Century Fox 
Matthew Vaughn (centre) on the set of Kingsman The 25-year-old English actor also worked on another Matthew Vaughn production earlier in the year, namely Eddie the Eagle , about Britain's first Olympic ski jumper, Eddie 'The Eagle' Edwards.Directed by Dexter Fletcher, it was produced by Vaughn, which means there was never really any doubt that Egerton would return for the sequel to outrageously successful Kingsman . Whether his co-star Colin Firth comes back, however, remains to be seen...
